# ProjectBanner Component

### ProjectBanner

**Exports:**
- `ProjectBanner` - Project banner component

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { ProjectBanner } from 'kampsy-ui';
	import { ShieldCheck } from 'kampsy-ui/icons';
</script>

<div class="w-full">
	<ProjectBanner
		icon={ShieldCheck}
		callToAction={{
			label: 'Disable',
			href: '/project-banner'
		}}
		label="Attack Challenge Mode is enabled for this project"
		variant="success"
	/>
</div>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/project-banner for full documentation and examples.
